features: With USB connector, 2.4Ghz optical wireless transmission, operation distance is up to 10 meters.
DPI:1600, with the best comfortable speed.Plug and Play, no any drive is needed.
Powered by 2x AAA battery, please notice that the battery isn't included.
Support all Windows 98 / ME / NT / 2000 / XP / Vista / Win 7 / Linux or Mac OS.
With the headlight and fashion sport car shape design, cool gaming mouse for PC Laptop.
body.description: Sport Car Style Wireless Mouse 3 Colors:Blue, Red, Yellow Cool sport car mouse style mouse, eyecatching ergonomic design. Unique headlight design, works well in the dark at night. Mini Receiver can be contained into the mouse and easy to carry.Light weight enough to take it everywhere, a good choice for home use and on the go. This brand new car mouse uses the 2.4Ghz wireless optical technology, transmission up to 10 metres operating distance, plug in and play, no need any code or drive, works on most surfaces smoothly,16 wireless working channels, automatic frequency jumping, 1600 DPI is good for daily use and playing game. Support most operating system, Windows 98 / ME / NT / 2000 / XP / Vista / Win 7 / Linux or Mac OS. Specifications: - Tracking method: Optical - Interface: USB 2.0 - Resolution: 1600 DPI - Button: 2 Buttons + 1 Scroll Wheel - Switch Life: 5 million cycles - Automatically Power-Saving sleeping function - Dimensions (approx.): 112mm x 53mm x 36mm - Power Supply: 2 x AAA Battery (not included) - Weight: about 100g - Effective: 2.4GHz wireless transmission up to 10 metres operating distance - System Compatibility: Windows 98 / ME / NT / 2000 / XP / Vista / Win 7 / Linux or Mac OS Package contents - 1 x TDRTECH sport car style wireless optical mouse - 1 x 2.4GHz USB receiver Please Note 1. The Batteries are not included. 2. The Mini USB Receiver was stored in the mouse, you need to pull the top cover open, you will find it.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 580 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun, cute and does the job
reviews.reviewText: I’m a Pediatric Nurse and we usually take laptops into the rooms with the parents and children to update their charts. The children LOVE my mouse. It doesn’t feel sturdy but I have dropped it numerous times without breakage. Figuring out where to put the battery was the hardest thing. The battery lasts, haven’t changed it yet. I’ve enjoyed using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mouse and fun to use
reviews.reviewText: The appearance is different, a red VW Bug - with likes that light up. Comfortable to use, although the right click button takes so getting used to (nearer the center of mouse than most). Don't know about battery life, but easy to turn off/on.Wife thinks it is cute, and since I had a 66 VW Bug kind of enjoy it as it brings back memories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I love my little car, mouse. He fits well in my hands and is easy to handle. The family and co-workers love him and adore the little blue headlights. I will say, the material feels a little cheap, so I've been very careful not to drop him, but inevitably taking off and putting on the top of the car to replace batteries feels like it'll break or crush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great and the headlights light up
reviews.reviewText: Works great! I was a little disappointed when I first unboxed the product when I found out that the headlights didn't light up. Well, as it turned out I was using less than optimal batteries and they soon died. I replaced the batteries while at work today and now my headlights work beautifully!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool, nice mouse
reviews.reviewText: Super cool product for a guy who loves cars. My husband love this on his desk. It fits his hands well, but if I’d have to use it fir a length of time, I couldn’t do it because the top of the car is too high for my little hands. Great for a man or older boy. Not good for smaller hands. Overall, great feel, look, and use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2018
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Seems to work great. I work at as a Car Salesman and this was very fitting for my job. It feels good in my hand too which I like. It honestly feels really similar in size to a standard mouse. I use the computer a lot so this gets lots of use. Appears to be holding up well so far, only had it a week though. Overall I am quite pleased with the order!**UPDATE**Still use this everyday. Everyone of my customers love it. This will hold up for a long time to come. Great product.***2nd Update***I’ve had this for under two months now. And it’s completely broke. It’s super glitchy. I went and tried to blow it out with duster to see if that would help with no success. New batteries, cleaned the connections no luck. It was really cool while it lasted but I’m extremely disappointed now.***3rd Update*** After complaining about the product and changing my star rating, company never once contacted me. And I can find no way to contact them. Very very disappointed...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quality control might be an issue. I purchased two of these at two separate times. One works fine, the other, not so much. Headlights don't light up but it doesn't seem to keep it from functioning properly. I will not go through the hassle to return. Just be aware.
